>
[Rat Familiar](/Feats.aspx?ID=5653) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=769" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 30 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You have a pet rat that has become magically bonded to you. You gain a [familiar](/Rules.aspx?ID=2121), and this familiar must be a rat. It still gets the benefits of familiar abilities, but its base form remains a rat.
